#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

long long  power(long long x, long long y)
{
    long long temp;
    if( y == 0)
        return 1;
    temp = power(x, y/2);
    if (y%2 == 0)
        return temp*temp;
    else
        return x*temp*temp;
}
 

int main()
{

    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        long long n;
        cin>>n;
        bool flag=false;
        long long bmax=(long long)(log2(n));
        for (int i=2;i<=bmax;i++)
        {
            //long double a=exp(log(n)/i);
            long double a =pow(n,1.0/(long double)i);
            long long aa=(long long)a;
            if(power(aa,i)==n||power(aa+1,i)==n)
                {
                    flag=true;
                    break;
                }
        }
        if(flag)
            cout<<"YES\n";
        else cout<<"NO\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
